name: Vista Research
overview:
Vista Research Inc. was founded in 2001 with the goal of connecting clients to individuals with experience in industries such as Aerospace and Defense, Basic Materials, Business Services, Energy, Financial Services, Healthcare, Hospitality, Leisure and Gaming, Industrials, Legal, Media, Retail/Consumer, Technology and Telecom. Acquired by Standard & Poorâ€™s in 2006, Vista Research is now part of its Equity Research Services group.

Currently, Vista Research operates as a subscription-based, primary research service that supports institutional money managers, corporations and legal and consulting firms. Vista Research connects its clients with Members of the Society of Industry Leaders, a carefully selected global network of key thought leaders and industry professionals. Clients have access to a wide range of product offerings which include one-on-one phone consultations, access to industry specific teleconferences, follow-up consultations on industry conferences, and execution of industry surveys, just to name a few. In short, Vista Research provides clients with an efficient and unique opportunity to gain better insight and understanding about a particular industry, facilitating more informed decisions.
